data.text: @DanielleBaker11 @gloshospitals @GlosHealthNHS Ah you ledgend!!! 💙 thank you so much for what you do

@Gemma_Fox @gloshospitals @GlosHealthNHS I think ours will be soon. I’ve just applied to work in the hospital’s vaccination clinic and training is due to start January 4th so hopefully won’t be too long
@DanielleBaker11 @gloshospitals @GlosHealthNHS Ours came literally out of the blue. Email a week ago and boom, vaccine!
@Gemma_Fox @gloshospitals @GlosHealthNHS I’m sooooo jealous. We don’t know when we’re getting ours 🙁

@Gemma_Fox @gloshospitals @GlosHealthNHS Our trust is still on the high risk staff at the mo i think. Definitely haven't had the patients facing email yet. The only patient facing email I've had is about the home testing.
@stephyh1988 @gloshospitals @GlosHealthNHS Our trusts are doing ALL patient facing staff first. Email went round on my last day pre Christmas and I booked immediately.
@Gemma_Fox @gloshospitals @GlosHealthNHS Way to go. Im still waiting for the invite. God knows how long it will take to get round to us lot in the hospital

@siany1974 @Gemma_Fox @gloshospitals @GlosHealthNHS I don't disagree at all and as you rightly suggested, there are many important key worker jobs working across both the public and private sectors (I wasn't for one minute suggesting that i should be ahead of anyone else) I'm glad I don't have the job of prioritising them
@FearlessOAP @siany1974 @Lambpie1973 @gloshospitals @GlosHealthNHS And then hopefully followed by NHS admin who have contact with clinicians but not patients. Because without them our NHS falls apart
@Harri__xo @Lambpie1973 @Gemma_Fox @gloshospitals @GlosHealthNHS I class you as in with teachers so fingers crossed 🤞🤞
@siany1974 @Lambpie1973 @Gemma_Fox @gloshospitals @GlosHealthNHS I would think that those who are in contact with the public will get priority.
@CarolineNapper @Lambpie1973 @Gemma_Fox @gloshospitals @GlosHealthNHS Of course, they are with all  the amazing staff working with them ❤️

@Lambpie1973 @Gemma_Fox @gloshospitals @GlosHealthNHS Long list of priority I think first Chris and will depend on who they will be classing as priority key workers. Not saying certain jobs are more important as others but I would guess that teachers will be top of the list after NHS/Social care staff 🤷‍♀️

@Gemma_Fox @gloshospitals @GlosHealthNHS I'm hoping that as reported today other key workers might be getting the vaccination sooner than originally planned otherwise I'll be waiting until late next year
